segments.text: Come on , Let's go for lunch , Gregory .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was going to eat in , I'm short on cash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about it.It ' s on me .

segments.text: In that case , I'm with you . Em.this is good .

segments.text: I agreed , Hi , guess what ? I went bungee jumping last weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you on the up and up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . you know , I'm into serious sport in a big way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you asked me , you've got a screw loose somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: come off it , It's not that serious . You should DIY ( do it yourself ) sometime .

segments.text: Fat chance , I'm too scared of bungee jumping .

segments.text: No , really , I think you'd like it . I adapted to it right off the bat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did that have to do with me ? I'm not the self-seeker like you .

segments.text: I had a sneaking suspicion about you , Eric , I think you've lost it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not really , but I think I have lost my wallet . Where can it be ?
